text: Dmitry Kharatyan PAR (born Dmitry Vadimovich Kharatyan () 21 January 1960) is a Russian actor. He is of Armenian descent. His first movie role was in Vladimir Menshov's Practical Joke in 1977. In March 2014, he signed a letter in support of President Vladimir Putin actions on Crimea. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian television presenters Category:Russian comedians Category:Armenian actors Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Dmitry Kharatyan
